create.description:
Create a LFG group!```Example:
Create an Overwatch group for 6 people
.create Overwatch | 2020-10-21 15:00 | 6

Create an FFXIV group for unlimited people
.create Overwatch | 2020-10-21 15:00```

delete.description:
Delete a LFG group that you created!```Example:
.delete g6HY```

join.description:
Join an existing LFG group!```Example:
.join g6HY```

leave.description:
Leave an LFG group that you joined!```Example:
.leave g6HY```
